name: Ian Ziering
description:
"Beverly Hills, 90210" sure was trendsetting and popular... We wonder, what has happened to the actors since then?

Jason Priestly tried to be a race car driver, crashed into a wall, and almost killed himself.

Shannen Doherty appeared in terrible TV ads for shady online colleges.

Jennie Garth headlined a reality show about getting back to her "country roots".

Brian Austin Green married Megan Fox.

Gabrielle Carteris fell into a wormhole and was swept into a different dimension.

Luke Perry starred in a movie... on the Hallmark Channel.

Tori Spelling is still Tori Spelling.

Come to think of it, Ian Ziering's turn in "Sharknado" might just push him to the top of the list?
